lead_paragraph: A self-driving car being tested by Google struck a public bus on a city street in Mountain View, Calif.

headline.print_headline: Autonomous Google Car Hits Public Bus During Test Drive
headline.main: Autonomous Google Car Hits Public Bus During Test Drive

snippet: A self-driving car being tested by Google struck a public bus on a city street in Mountain View, Calif.
abstract: California Dept of Motor Vehicles reports Google self-driving car struck public bus in Mountain View during February test drive;  no injuries are reported, but incident could represent first time one of company's autonomous vehicles was cause of accident.
